src:
Edson Tavares Puas dengan Kemenangan Persija atas Tira Persikabo
04 Nov 2019, 00:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta berhasil mengalahkan Tira Persikabo pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar. Dalam laga yang berlangsung di Stadion Patriot Candrabhaga, Bekasi, Minggu (3/11), tim berjuluk Macan Kemayoran itu menang dengan skor 2-0.
Dua gol kemenangan Persija tercipta pada babak kedua. Masing-masing oleh Alexandre Luiz Reame Xandao (52'), dan Marko Simic (72').
Kemenangan tersebut membuat sang pelatih, Edson Tavares puas. Sebab, Tira Persikabo bukanlah lawan yang mudah untuk dikalahkan.
"Ini laga yang sulit, jadi saya puas Persija bisa menang 2-0. Saya sangat puas dengan performa tim kali ini. Ini yang penting bagi saya," ujar Tavares usai laga.
"Pertandingan yang sangat menarik hari ini. Tira-Persikabo bukan tim lemah, mereka bagus dan kuat," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Edson Tavares Satisfied with Persija's victory over Tira Persikabo
Nov 04 2019, 00:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta defeated Tira Persikabo in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 broadcast by Indosiar. In the match that took place at the Patriot Candrabhaga Stadium, Bekasi, Sunday (3/11), the team nicknamed the Tigers Kemayoran won by a score of 2-0.
Persija's two winning goals were created in the second half. Respectively by Alexandre Luiz Reame Xandao (52 '), and Marko Simic (72').
The victory made the coach, Edson Tavares satisfied. Because, Tira Persikabo is not an easy opponent to defeat.
"This game is difficult, so I am satisfied Persija can win 2-0. I am very satisfied with the team's performance this time. This is important for me," Tavares said after the match.
"It was a very interesting match today. Tira-Persikabo are not a weak team, they are good and strong," he added.
